column2: Well, hello there. While we're investigating, I need you to take care of some stuff.

You'd think we would gotten this file debacle sorted out by now! 

It's amazing how much time can pass when you're focused on a problem.

Alright then, let's go ahead and launch the System.
Shall we do a... quiz? Pay attention:
3) The System App lets you change your cursor into a wedge of cheese, a unicorn, and poop.
That's it. I hope you've learned something from this and the wonders of the System. Bye for now.

What was the point of all of that? Why waste our talent with quizzes when we should be investigating?

I just stepped on this thing... whaaat? The System Level 2 key! Shhhhh... Take it now that nobody's looking.
This will let us deeper into the System. We def need to come back here later.
